title: Aliah Umali's E-Health Monitoring System: A Lifesaving Innovation
description: A 23-year-old electronics student from Ndirande develops an e-health system to deliver emergency alerts and protect vulnerable communities.
full story: Aliah Umali,a 23 year old Bsc Electronics student from Ndirande develops an innovative E-health monitoring system designed  to provide immediate assistance to those in critical needs.Motivated by her research,Aliah discovered that many pregnant women face life-threatening challenges when giving birth, especially in remote areas far from hospitals. Additionally, her system prioritizes the safety of vulnerable individuals, including albinos, who are often exposed to danger. This technology sends instant alerts to medical professionals and caretakers, ensuring timely intervention and potentially saving countless lives.
